EstablishmentDetail.RightToReply: <p> The conditions at the time of inspection were not trpical of the normal conditions. We make sure thermometer and tools are in working condition but the batter had run out, but this has been rectified. Also we have changed chef as the previous chef had begun to slack and seemed to have lost his passion, we have replaced him with someone who has better management skills and speaks English so as to improve communication. He has implemented a new cleaning rota, to help maintain cleanliness, also rubber mats have been made available to kitchen staff to stop them using cloths, signs have been placed in the kitchen and store room to make sure thay act accordingly and store food correctly. I have alos set up a refresher course in food safety for staff to ensure high standards.</p>
